com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.widget

Class DynamicImageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatImageView
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.widget.DynamicImageView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DynamicWidget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicHeaderImageView

    public class DynamicImageView
extends AppCompatImageView
implements DynamicWidget
    An ImageView to apply color filter according to the supplied parameters.

        public void initialize()
